text: ora ki tabe prthibite paribhramana kare ni, tahale ora dekhate peto kemana hayechila tadera parinama yara odera purbabarti chila? Tara odera ceye adhikasankhyaka chila ara saktite prabalatara o duniyate kirtisthapane chila paradarsi. Kinta tara ya arjana kare calechila ta tadera kono kaje ase ni.
